00286 template <class T>
00287 class XVWindowX: virtual public XVWindow<T> {
00288  protected:
00289   using XVWindow<T>::width ;
00290   using XVWindow<T>::height ;
00291   using XVWindow<T>::posx ;
00292   using XVWindow<T>::posy ;
00293   using XVWindow<T>::windowTitle ;
00294   using XVWindow<T>::frames_buf ;
00295 
00296  protected:
00297 
00298    Display          *dpy;
00299    Window      window;
00300    const T               **shared_fields;
00301    bool             own_buffers;
00302    XImage         **shm_images;
00303    XImage      *flip_image;
00304    XImage      *def_image;
00305 #ifdef HAVE_LIBXEXT
00306    XShmSegmentInfo      *def_shminfo;   // shared memory segment
00307 #endif
00308    int              event_mask;
00309    int                 buffer_count;
00310    int              bitmap_pad;    // screen depth
00311    u_short          flip;
00312 
00313    XGCValues        xgcv;           // settings for graphics context
00314    unsigned long    bw_color[256];
00315    unsigned long    draw_color[DRAW_COLORS+2];
00316    GC               gc_window[DRAW_COLORS];  //graphics context
00317    GC               gc_clear;
00318    void             get_colors(void);
00319    u_short          back_flag;     // double buffering avail?
00320    u_short          shared_memory;
00321    int              num_fonts;
00322    Font             *font;
00323 #ifdef HAVE_LIBXEXT
00324    XdbeBackBuffer       back_buffer;   // the back buffer if double-buffering
00325    XdbeSwapInfo          swap_info;     // info used when swapping buffers
00326 #else
00327    int              back_buffer;
00328 #endif
00329    
00330    bool                 exposeEvent;
00331    
00332   public:
00333 
00335    virtual void          map(void) { if(window)
00336                      { XMapWindow(dpy,window); XFlush(dpy); } };
00337 
00339    virtual void          unmap(void) { if(window)
00340                               { XUnmapWindow(dpy,window); XFlush(dpy); } };
00341    
00342    /* resize window */
00343    virtual void          resize( const XVSize& );
00344    virtual void         resize( int w, int h ) { resize( XVSize(w,h) ); }
00345 
00346    int              check_events(int *ret_field);
00347 
00348    int              get_font(char *name);
00349 
00350    int              print_string(char *string,int x, int y,
00351                                        int col_index=0,
00352                            int font_index=0);
00353 
00355    virtual void          swap_buffers(void)
00356 #ifdef HAVE_LIBXEXT 
00357                     { if(back_flag)
00358                         XdbeSwapBuffers(dpy,&swap_info,1); };
00359 #else     
00360                     {};
00361 #endif
00362 
00363    virtual void         setTitle( const char *title = 0 );
00364 
00365    virtual void          setImages(XVImageRGB<T> *, int count);
00366    virtual void             CopyImage(int which,u_short flip=0);
00367 
00368    virtual void     ClearWindow(void) {
00369 #ifdef HAVE_LIBXEXT
00370      if( back_flag ) {
00371        XFillRectangle( dpy, back_buffer, gc_clear, 0, 0, width, height );
00372      }else 
00373 #endif
00374        XClearWindow(dpy,window);
00375    }
00376 
00377 
00378    virtual void          CopySubImage(const XVImageRGB<T> &,bool flip=0);
00379 
00380    virtual void         flush(void){XSync(dpy,0);};
00381 
00382    void                 expose(void) { exposeEvent = true; };
00383 
00384    const T          ** get_shared_fields(void) const {
00385                        return (const T**)shared_fields;
00386    };
00387 
00389    XVWindowX(const XVImageRGB<T> &, 
00390           int posx = 0,
00391           int posy = 0, 
00392           char * title = NULL, 
00393           int event_mask=0,
00394           char * display = NULL,
00395           int num_buf = 2,
00396           int double_buf = 0);
00397 
00399    XVWindowX(int w, int h,
00400           int posx = 0,
00401           int posy = 0, 
00402           char * title = NULL, 
00403           int event_mask=0,
00404           char * display = NULL,
00405           int num_buf = 2,
00406           int double_buf = 0);
00407    
00408    virtual ~XVWindowX(void);
00409 
00410    XVImageRGB<T> getDisplayedImage(int px = 0, int py = 0, 
00411                        int w = -1, int h = -1);
00412 
00417    Display *        getXDisplay(void) { return dpy; };
00418    Drawable         getXDrawable(void) { 
00419 #ifdef HAVE_LIBXEXT
00420      return back_flag ? back_buffer : window; 
00421 #else
00422      return window;
00423 #endif
00424    };
00425 };

00435 template <class PIXEL>
00436 class XVDrawWindowX : public XVDrawWindow<PIXEL>, 
00437                       public XVWindowX<PIXEL> {
00438   
00439   typedef std::map<string, GC>::iterator MI;
00440  protected:
00441   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::width ;
00442   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::height ;
00443   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::posx ;
00444   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::posy ;

00447   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::back_flag ;
00448   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::back_buffer ;
00449   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::window ;
00450 
00451  public:

00453   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::unmap;

00455   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::setImages;

00457   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::CopySubImage;
00458   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::swap_buffers;
00459   using XVWindowX<PIXEL>::flush;
00460 
00461  protected:
00462   
00463   std::map<string, GC> GCmap;
00464   int function;
00465 
00466   void setFunction(int);
00467   
00468  public:
00469   
00470   XVDrawWindowX(const XVImageRGB<PIXEL > & im, int px = 0, int py = 0,
00471           char * title = NULL,
00472           int event_mask = 0, char * disp = NULL, 
00473           int num_buf = 2, int double_buf = 1, int function = GXcopy);
00474 
00475   XVDrawWindowX(int w, int h, int px = 0, int py = 0,
00476           char * title = NULL,
00477           int event_mask = 0, char * disp = NULL, 
00478           int num_buf = 2, int double_buf = 1, int function = GXcopy);
00479 
00480   ~XVDrawWindowX();
00481 
00482   void setXOR(){ function = GXxor; setFunction(function); }
00483   void setCOPY(){ function = GXcopy; setFunction(function); }
00484   
00485   virtual void addColor(XVDrawColor);
00486   
00487   virtual int drawPoint(int x, int y, 
00488                XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR);
00489   virtual int drawLine(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, 
00490                  XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR);
00491   virtual int drawRectangle(int x, int y, int w, int h, 
00492                    XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR);
00493   virtual int drawEllipse(int x, int y, int w, int h, 
00494                  XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR);
00495   virtual int fillRectangle(int x, int y, int w, int h, 
00496                    XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR);
00497   virtual int fillEllipse(int x, int y, int w, int h, 
00498                  XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR);
00499   virtual int drawString(int x, int y, char * str, int length, 
00500                 XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR);
00501   
00502 };

00506 class XVDrawObjectX {
00507 
00508  public:
00509 
00510   Display * disp;
00511   Window win;
00512   GC     context;
00513 
00514   XVDrawObjectX(Display * d, Window w, GC g) : disp(d), win(w), context(g) {}
00515   void reset(Display * d, Window w, GC g) {
00516     disp = d;  win = w; context = g;
00517   };
00518   
00519   virtual ~XVDrawObjectX() {}
00520 };
00521 
00523 class XVDrawPointX : public virtual XVDrawPoint, public XVDrawObjectX {
00524 
00525  public:
00526 
00527   XVDrawPointX(Display * d, Window w, GC g, 
00528             XVPosition p, XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR) :
00529     XVDrawPoint(p, c), XVDrawObjectX(d, w, g) {}
00530 
00531   virtual ~XVDrawPointX () {}
00532 
00533   virtual void draw() {
00534     XDrawPoint(disp, win, context,
00535             this->point.PosX(), this->point.PosY());
00536   }
00537 };
00538 
00539 
00541 class XVDrawLineX : public virtual XVDrawLine, public XVDrawObjectX {
00542 
00543  public:
00544 
00545   XVDrawLineX(Display * d, Window w, GC g, 
00546            XVPosition p1, XVPosition p2, XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR) :
00547     XVDrawLine(p1, p2, c), XVDrawObjectX(d, w, g) {}
00548 
00549   virtual ~XVDrawLineX () {}
00550 
00551   virtual void draw() {
00552     XDrawLine(disp, win, context, 
00553            this->point1.PosX(), this->point1.PosY(),
00554            this->point2.PosX(), this->point2.PosY());
00555   }
00556 };

00558 
00560 class XVDrawRectX : public virtual XVDrawRect, public XVDrawObjectX {
00561 
00562  public:
00563 
00564   XVDrawRectX(Display * d, Window w, GC g, XVImageGeneric r, 
00565            bool f = false, XVDrawColor c = DEFAULT_COLOR) :
00566     XVDrawRect(r, f, c), XVDrawObjectX(d, w, g) {}
00567 
00568   virtual ~XVDrawRectX () {}
00569 
00570   virtual void draw() {
00571     if(this->fill) {
00572       XFillRectangle(disp, win, context,
00573                this->region.PosX(), this->region.PosY(),
00574                this->region.Width(), this->region.Height());
00575     }else{
00576       XDrawRectangle(disp, win, context,
00577                this->region.PosX(), this->region.PosY(),
00578                this->region.Width(), this->region.Height());
00579     }
00580   }
00581 };

00593   virtual ~XVDrawEllipseX () {}
00594 
00595   virtual void draw() {
00596     if(this->fill){
00597       XFillArc(disp, win, context, 
00598             this->region.PosX(), this->region.PosY(),
00599             this->region.Width(), this->region.Height(), 0, 360*64);
00600     }else{
00601       XDrawArc(disp, win, context,
00602             this->region.PosX(), this->region.PosY(),
00603             this->region.Width(), this->region.Height(), 0, 360*64);
00604     }
00605   }      
00606 };

00622           this->string, this->length);
00623   };

00762 template <class PIXEL, class IN_IMAGE>
00763 class XVThreadedWindowX : public XVInteractive, public XVStateWindowX<PIXEL> {
00764  protected:
00765   using XVStateWindowX<PIXEL>::dpy ;
00766   
00767  public:
00768   using XVStateWindowX<PIXEL>::map;
00769   using XVStateWindowX<PIXEL>::unmap;
00770   using XVStateWindowX<PIXEL>::resize;
00771   using XVStateWindowX<PIXEL>::setImages;
00772 
00773   using XVStateWindowX<PIXEL>::addColor;
00774 
00775  protected:
00776 
00777   XVVideo<IN_IMAGE > * vid;
00778 
00779   Cursor crossHair, arrow;
00780   
00781   typedef void * VOIDP;
00782 
00783   bool hasBeenSelected;
00784   bool currentlySelecting;
00785   pthread_mutex_t selectMutex;
00786   
00787   XVDrawObject * selectedObject;
00788   
00789  public:
00790   
00791   static void * selectPointThreadFunc(void *);
00792   static void * selectLineThreadFunc(void *);
00793   static void * selectRectThreadFunc(void *);
00794   static void * selectEllipseThreadFunc(void *);
00795   static void * selectSizedRectThreadFunc(void *);
00796   static void * selectAngledRectThreadFunc(void *);
00797 
00798   XVThreadedWindowX(XVVideo<IN_IMAGE > * v, 
00799               const XVImageRGB<PIXEL > & im, 
00800               int px = 0, int py = 0, 
00801               char * title = NULL,
00802               int event_mask = 0, char * disp = NULL,
00803               int num_buf = 2, int double_buf = 1, 
00804               int function = GXxor) :
00805     XVStateWindowX<PIXEL>(im, px, py, title, event_mask, disp, num_buf, 
00806                  double_buf, function), 
00807     XVWindow<PIXEL>(im.Width(),im.Height()), selectedObject(NULL), vid(v) {
00808 
00809     crossHair = XCreateFontCursor(dpy, XC_crosshair);
00810     arrow     = XCreateFontCursor(dpy, XC_arrow);
00811 
00812     pthread_mutex_init( & selectMutex, NULL ); 
00813     currentlySelecting = false;
00814   };
00815 
00816   XVThreadedWindowX(XVVideo<IN_IMAGE > * v, 
00817               int w, int h, 
00818               int px = 0, int py = 0, 
00819               char * title = NULL,
00820               int event_mask = 0, char * disp = NULL,
00821               int num_buf = 2, int double_buf = 1, 
00822               int function = GXxor) :
00823     XVStateWindowX<PIXEL>(w, h, px, py, title, event_mask, disp, num_buf, 
00824                  double_buf, function),
00825     XVWindow<PIXEL>(w,h), selectedObject(NULL), vid(v) {
00826 
00827     crossHair = XCreateFontCursor(dpy, XC_crosshair);
00828     arrow     = XCreateFontCursor(dpy, XC_arrow);
00829 
00830     pthread_mutex_init( & selectMutex, NULL ); 
00831     currentlySelecting = false;
00832   };
00833   
00834   void setVideoDevice(XVVideo<IN_IMAGE > * v) { vid = v; }
